name: Quso.ai
description: Quso.ai is an all-in-one AI-powered platform for social media content creation, management, and analytics.
longDescription: Quso.ai, formerly Vidyo.ai, is an AI-driven social media management platform designed to streamline content creation and marketing for creators, businesses, and educational institutions. Its mission is to simplify the process of repurposing long-form videos into engaging short-form content optimized for platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts. By leveraging advanced AI tools, Quso.ai automates video editing, scheduling, and analytics, saving users significant time and effort. The platform supports a range of users, from solo creators to marketing teams, by offering intuitive features that enhance productivity and boost online presence. It also provides tailored solutions for schools and universities to scale their social media strategies. Quso.ai stands out for its user-friendly interface, making AI technology accessible even to those with minimal technical expertise.
features: AI Clip Maker automatically extracts and edits the best moments from long-form videos into viral short clips for social media platforms.
AI Video Generator creates professional-quality videos from text, ideas, or trends, eliminating the need for complex filming or editing.
Social Media Scheduler optimizes posting times based on AI insights to maximize audience engagement across multiple platforms.
AI Content Planner centralizes content management, allowing users to organize and schedule posts while aligning with brand voice.
Intelliclips feature transforms long videos into bite-sized, platform-specific clips with automated captions and resizing.
AI Influencer tool generates lifelike videos using over 80 AI avatars, enabling content creation without cameras or crews.
AI Social Media Analytics provides detailed, user-friendly dashboards to track content performance and audience engagement.
B-Roll Integration offers access to a royalty-free stock media library to enhance videos with additional footage.
AI Post Generator repurposes video content into carousel slides or social posts, saving time on multi-format content creation.
AI Content Assistant (Viddy) helps brainstorm ideas, write engaging posts, and optimize social media strategies.
Automatic Video Chapters organize long videos into segmented clips, improving viewer navigation and engagement.
Trend Analyzer converts trending topics, like Reddit posts, into timely videos to capture audience interest.

faqs.question: What types of videos can I upload to Quso.ai?
faqs.answer: Quso.ai supports videos from YouTube or uploads in mp4, m4v, mov, and webm formats, with free users limited to 5GB and Pro users up to 15GB. Currently, HDR, vlogs, gaming, music, and live videos are not recommended, but support is planned soon.

faqs.question: Does Quso.ai offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quso.ai provides a free plan with 75 credits/month, 720p render quality, and limited features, including a watermark on exports.

faqs.question: How many clips can Quso.ai generate from one video?
faqs.answer: The number of clips depends on the videoâ€™s length and content, with an hour-long video typically generating 5-45 short clips.

faqs.question: Can I customize videos generated by Quso.ai?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can edit subtitles, voiceovers, backgrounds, fonts, and colors to align videos with their brand identity.

faqs.question: Which platforms does Quso.ai support for publishing?
faqs.answer: Quso.ai supports publishing to Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn, and other major social media platforms.

faqs.question: How does Quso.ai ensure data security?
faqs.answer: Quso.ai implements advanced security measures to protect user data and does not share information with unauthorized parties.

faqs.question: Can Quso.ai be used by educational institutions?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quso.ai offers tailored AI tools for schools and universities to create lecture recaps, event highlights, and accessible content for students.

faqs.question: How do I upgrade my Quso.ai subscription?
faqs.answer: To upgrade, go to account settings, click the 'Upgrade' button, and choose a monthly or annual plan that suits your needs.
